articles.description: A chemical plant near Houston has been burning since Sunday morning. Firefighters are trying to keep it from spreading while it burns out. But officials said they don't know how long it will take. Janet Shamlian reports.

articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: Women with twin brothers paid less than those with twin sisters, study shows
articles.description: A study shows that women who shared their mother's womb with their twin brother are less likely to graduate from school and more likely to earn lower lifetime wages than women with a twin sister.
